title: Mobile Collaborative Mathematics Learning Design for Corporate Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical math problem-solving abilities through collaborative learning in smartphone-based limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively solve math problems with peers using Web 2.0 tools in mobile environments.
Learners demonstrate practical application skills by completing team-based data analysis projects using only limited technical equipment (smartphones).
Learners can perform mathematical decision-making with over 80% accuracy by utilizing real-time feedback provided by the learning design system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
